text: The sons of Eliab: Nemuel, and Dathan, and Abiram. These are that Dathan and Abiram, who were called of the congregation, who strove against Moses and against Aaron in the company of Korah, when they strove against Yahweh,

name: Numbers 26:10
text: and the earth opened its mouth, and swallowed them up together with Korah, when that company died; what time the fire devoured two hundred fifty men, and they became a sign.

name: Numbers 26:11
text: Notwithstanding, the sons of Korah didn"t die.

name: Numbers 26:12
text: The sons of Simeon after their families: of Nemuel, the family of the Nemuelites; of Jamin, the family of the Jaminites; of Jachin, the family of the Jachinites;

name: Numbers 26:13
text: of Zerah, the family of the Zerahites; of Shaul, the family of the Shaulites.

name: Numbers 26:14
text: These are the families of the Simeonites, twenty-two thousand two hundred.

name: Numbers 26:15
text: The sons of Gad after their families: of Zephon, the family of the Zephonites; of Haggi, the family of the Haggites; of Shuni, the family of the Shunites;

name: Numbers 26:16
text: of Ozni, the family of the Oznites; of Eri, the family of the Erites;

name: Numbers 26:17
text: of Arod, the family of the Arodites; of Areli, the family of the Arelites.

name: Numbers 26:18
text: These are the families of the sons of Gad according to those who were numbered of them, forty thousand and five hundred.

name: Numbers 26:19
text: The sons of Judah: Er and Onan; and Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan.

name: Numbers 26:20
text: The sons of Judah after their families were: of Shelah, the family of the Shelanites; of Perez, the family of the Perezites; of Zerah, the family of the Zerahites.

name: Numbers 26:21
text: The sons of Perez were: of Hezron, the family of the Hezronites; of Hamul, the family of the Hamulites.

name: Numbers 26:22
text: These are the families of Judah according to those who were numbered of them, seventy-six thousand five hundred.

name: Numbers 26:23
text: The sons of Issachar after their families: of Tola, the family of the Tolaites; of Puvah, the family of the Punites;

name: Numbers 26:24
text: of Jashub, the family of the Jashubites; of Shimron, the family of the Shimronites.

name: Numbers 26:25
text: These are the families of Issachar according to those who were numbered of them, sixty-four thousand three hundred.

name: Numbers 26:26
text: The sons of Zebulun after their families: of Sered, the family of the Seredites; of Elon, the family of the Elonites; of Jahleel, the family of the Jahleelites.

name: Numbers 26:27
text: These are the families of the Zebulunites according to those who were numbered of them, sixty thousand five hundred.

name: Numbers 26:28
text: The sons of Joseph after their families: Manasseh and Ephraim.

name: Numbers 26:29
text: The sons of Manasseh: of Machir, the family of the Machirites; and Machir became the father of Gilead; of Gilead, the family of the Gileadites.

name: Numbers 26:30
text: These are the sons of Gilead: of Iezer, the family of the Iezerites; of Helek, the family of the Helekites;

name: Numbers 26:31
text: and Asriel, the family of the Asrielites; and Shechem, the family of the Shechemites;

name: Numbers 26:32
text: and Shemida, the family of the Shemidaites; and Hepher, the family of the Hepherites.

name: Numbers 26:33
text: Zelophehad the son of Hepher had no sons, but daughters: and the names of the daughters of Zelophehad were Mahlah, and Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.

name: Numbers 26:34
text: These are the families of Manasseh; and those who were numbered of them were fifty-two thousand seven hundred.

name: Numbers 26:35
text: These are the sons of Ephraim after their families: of Shuthelah, the family of the Shuthelahites; of Becher, the family of the Becherites; of Tahan, the family of the Tahanites.

name: Numbers 26:36
text: These are the sons of Shuthelah: of Eran, the family of the Eranites.

name: Numbers 26:37
text: These are the families of the sons of Ephraim according to those who were numbered of them, thirty-two thousand five hundred. These are the sons of Joseph after their families.

name: Numbers 26:38
text: The sons of Benjamin after their families: of Bela, the family of the Belaites; of Ashbel, the family of the Ashbelites; of Ahiram, the family of the Ahiramites;

name: Numbers 26:39
text: of Shephupham, the family of the Shuphamites; of Hupham, the family of the Huphamites.

name: Numbers 26:40
text: The sons of Bela were Ard and Naaman: the family of the Ardites; of Naaman, the family of the Naamites.

name: Numbers 26:41
text: These are the sons of Benjamin after their families; and those who were numbered of them were forty-five thousand six hundred.

name: Numbers 26:42
text: These are the sons of Dan after their families: of Shuham, the family of the Shuhamites. These are the families of Dan after their families.

name: Numbers 26:43
text: All the families of the Shuhamites, according to those who were numbered of them, were sixty-four thousand four hundred.

name: Numbers 26:44
text: The sons of Asher after their families: of Imnah, the family of the Imnites; of Ishvi, the family of the Ishvites; of Beriah, the family of the Berites.

name: Numbers 26:45
text: Of the sons of Beriah: of Heber, the family of the Heberites; of Malchiel, the family of the Malchielites.

name: Numbers 26:46
text: The name of the daughter of Asher was Serah.

name: Numbers 26:47
text: These are the families of the sons of Asher according to those who were numbered of them, fifty-three thousand and four hundred.

name: Numbers 26:48
text: The sons of Naphtali after their families: of Jahzeel, the family of the Jahzeelites; of Guni, the family of the Gunites;

name: Numbers 26:49
text: of Jezer, the family of the Jezerites; of Shillem, the family of the Shillemites.

name: Numbers 26:50
text: These are the families of Naphtali according to their families; and those who were numbered of them were forty-five thousand four hundred.

name: Numbers 26:51
text: These are those who were numbered of the children of Israel, six hundred one thousand seven hundred thirty.

name: Numbers 26:52
text: Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

name: Numbers 26:53
text: "To these the land shall be divided for an inheritance according to the number of names.

name: Numbers 26:54
text: To the more you shall give the more inheritance, and to the fewer you shall give the less inheritance: to everyone according to those who were numbered of him shall his inheritance be given.

name: Numbers 26:55
text: Notwithstanding, the land shall be divided by lot: according to the names of the tribes of their fathers they shall inherit.

name: Numbers 26:56
text: According to the lot shall their inheritance be divided between the more and the fewer."

name: Numbers 26:57
text: These are those who were numbered of the Levites after their families: of Gershon, the family of the Gershonites; of Kohath, the family of the Kohathites; of Merari, the family of the Merarites.

name: Numbers 26:58
text: These are the families of Levi: the family of the Libnites, the family of the Hebronites, the family of the Mahlites, the family of the Mushites, the family of the Korahites. Kohath became the father of Amram.

name: Numbers 26:59
text: The name of Amram"s wife was Jochebed, the daughter of Levi, who was born to Levi in Egypt: and she bore to Amram Aaron and Moses, and Miriam their sister.

name: Numbers 26:60
text: To Aaron were born Nadab and Abihu, Eleazar and Ithamar.

name: Numbers 26:61
text: Nadab and Abihu died, when they offered strange fire before Yahweh.

name: Numbers 26:62
text: Those who were numbered of them were twenty-three thousand, every male from a month old and upward: for they were not numbered among the children of Israel, because there was no inheritance given them among the children of Israel.

name: Numbers 26:63
text: These are those who were numbered by Moses and Eleazar the priest, who numbered the children of Israel in the plains of Moab by the Jordan at Jericho.

name: Numbers 26:64
text: But among these there was not a man of them who were numbered by Moses and Aaron the priest, who numbered the children of Israel in the wilderness of Sinai.

name: Numbers 26:65
text: For Yahweh had said of them, They shall surely die in the wilderness. There was not left a man of them, except Caleb the son of Jephunneh, and Joshua the son of Nun.

name: Numbers 27:1
text: Then drew near the daughters of Zelophehad, the son of Hepher, the son of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, of the families of Manasseh the son of Joseph; and these are the names of his daughters: Mahlah, Noah, and Hoglah, and Milcah, and Tirzah.

name: Numbers 27:2
text: They stood before Moses, and before Eleazar the priest, and before the princes and all the congregation, at the door of the Tent of Meeting, saying,

name: Numbers 27:3
text: "Our father died in the wilderness, and he was not among the company of those who gathered themselves together against Yahweh in the company of Korah: but he died in his own sin; and he had no sons.

name: Numbers 27:4
text: Why should the name of our father be taken away from among his family, because he had no son? Give to us a possession among the brothers of our father."

name: Numbers 27:5
text: Moses brought their cause before Yahweh.

name: Numbers 27:6
text: Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

name: Numbers 27:7
text: "The daughters of Zelophehad speak right: you shall surely give them a possession of an inheritance among their father"s brothers; and you shall cause the inheritance of their father to pass to them.

name: Numbers 27:8
text: You shall speak to the children of Israel, saying, "If a man dies, and has no son, then you shall cause his inheritance to pass to his daughter.

name: Numbers 27:9
text: If he has no daughter, then you shall give his inheritance to his brothers.

name: Numbers 27:10
text: If he has no brothers, then you shall give his inheritance to his father"s brothers.

name: Numbers 27:11
text: If his father has no brothers, then you shall give his inheritance to his kinsman who is next to him of his family, and he shall possess it: and it shall be to the children of Israel a statute and ordinance, as Yahweh commanded Moses.""

name: Numbers 27:12
text: Yahweh said to Moses, "Go up into this mountain of Abarim, and see the land which I have given to the children of Israel.

name: Numbers 27:13
text: When you have seen it, you also shall be gathered to your people, as Aaron your brother was gathered;

name: Numbers 27:14
text: because you rebelled against my word in the wilderness of Zin, in the strife of the congregation, to sanctify me at the waters before their eyes." (These are the waters of Meribah of Kadesh in the wilderness of Zin.)

name: Numbers 27:15
text: Moses spoke to Yahweh, saying,

name: Numbers 27:16
text: "Let Yahweh, the God of the spirits of all flesh, appoint a man over the congregation,

name: Numbers 27:17
text: who may go out before them, and who may come in before them, and who may lead them out, and who may bring them in; that the congregation of Yahweh not be as sheep which have no shepherd."

name: Numbers 27:18
text: Yahweh said to Moses, "Take Joshua the son of Nun, a man in whom is the Spirit, and lay your hand on him;

name: Numbers 27:19
text: and set him before Eleazar the priest, and before all the congregation; and commission him in their sight.

name: Numbers 27:20
text: You shall put of your honor on him, that all the congregation of the children of Israel may obey.

name: Numbers 27:21
text: He shall stand before Eleazar the priest, who shall inquire for him by the judgment of the Urim before Yahweh: at his word shall they go out, and at his word they shall come in, both he, and all the children of Israel with him, even all the congregation."

name: Numbers 27:22
text: Moses did as Yahweh commanded him; and he took Joshua, and set him before Eleazar the priest, and before all the congregation:

name: Numbers 27:23
text: and he laid his hands on him, and commissioned him, as Yahweh spoke by Moses.

name: Numbers 28:1
text: Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

name: Numbers 28:2
text: "Command the children of Israel, and tell them, "My offering, my food for my offerings made by fire, of a pleasant aroma to me, you shall observe to offer to me in their due season."

name: Numbers 28:3
text: You shall tell them, "This is the offering made by fire which you shall offer to Yahweh: male lambs a year old without blemish, two day by day, for a continual burnt offering.

name: Numbers 28:4
text: You shall offer the one lamb in the morning, and you shall offer the other lamb at evening;

name: Numbers 28:5
text: with the tenth part of an ephah of fine flour for a meal offering, mixed with the fourth part of a hin of beaten oil.

name: Numbers 28:6
text: It is a continual burnt offering, which was ordained in Mount Sinai for a pleasant aroma, an offering made by fire to Yahweh.

name: Numbers 28:7
text: Its drink offering shall be the fourth part of a hin for the one lamb. You shall pour out a drink offering of strong drink to Yahweh in the holy place.

name: Numbers 28:8
text: The other lamb you shall offer at evening: as the meal offering of the morning, and as the drink offering of it, you shall offer it, an offering made by fire, of a pleasant aroma to Yahweh.

name: Numbers 28:9
text: ""On the Sabbath day two male lambs a year old without blemish, and two tenth parts of an ephah of fine flour for a meal offering, mixed with oil, and the drink offering of it:

name: Numbers 28:10
text: this is the burnt offering of every Sabbath, besides the continual burnt offering, and the drink offering of it.

name: Numbers 28:11
text: ""In the beginnings of your months you shall offer a burnt offering to Yahweh: two young bulls, and one ram, seven male lambs a year old without blemish;

name: Numbers 28:12
text: and three tenth parts of an ephah of fine flour for a meal offering, mixed with oil, for each bull; and two tenth parts of fine flour for a meal offering, mixed with oil, for the one ram;

name: Numbers 28:13
text: and a tenth part of fine flour mixed with oil for a meal offering to every lamb; for a burnt offering of a pleasant aroma, an offering made by fire to Yahweh.

name: Numbers 28:14
text: Their drink offerings shall be half a hin of wine for a bull, and the third part of a hin for the ram, and the fourth part of a hin for a lamb: this is the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.

name: Numbers 28:15
text: One male goat for a sin offering to Yahweh; it shall be offered besides the continual burnt offering, and the drink offering of it.

name: Numbers 28:16
text: ""In the first month, on the fourteenth day of the month, is Yahweh"s Passover.

name: Numbers 28:17
text: On the fifteenth day of this month shall be a feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.

name: Numbers 28:18
text: In the first day shall be a holy convocation: you shall do no servile work;

name: Numbers 28:19
text: but you shall offer an offering made by fire, a burnt offering to Yahweh: two young bulls, and one ram, and seven male lambs a year old; they shall be to you without blemish;

name: Numbers 28:20
text: and their meal offering, fine flour mixed with oil: you shall offer three tenth parts for a bull, and two tenth parts for the ram.

name: Numbers 28:21
text: You shall offer a tenth part for every lamb of the seven lambs;

name: Numbers 28:22
text: and one male goat for a sin offering, to make atonement for you.

name: Numbers 28:23
text: You shall offer these besides the burnt offering of the morning, which is for a continual burnt offering.

name: Numbers 28:24
text: In this way you shall offer daily, for seven days, the food of the offering made by fire, of a pleasant aroma to Yahweh: it shall be offered besides the continual burnt offering, and the drink offering of it.

name: Numbers 28:25
text: On the seventh day you shall have a holy convocation: you shall do no servile work.

name: Numbers 28:26
text: ""Also in the day of the first fruits, when you offer a new meal offering to Yahweh in your feast of weeks, you shall have a holy convocation; you shall do no servile work;

name: Numbers 28:27
text: but you shall offer a burnt offering for a pleasant aroma to Yahweh: two young bulls, one ram, seven male lambs a year old;

name: Numbers 28:28
text: and their meal offering, fine flour mixed with oil, three tenth parts for each bull, two tenth parts for the one ram,

name: Numbers 28:29
text: a tenth part for every lamb of the seven lambs;

name: Numbers 28:30
text: one male goat, to make atonement for you.

name: Numbers 28:31
text: Besides the continual burnt offering, and the meal offering of it, you shall offer them (they shall be to you without blemish), and their drink offerings.

name: Numbers 29:1
text: ""In the seventh month, on the first day of the month, you shall have a holy convocation; you shall do no servile work: it is a day of blowing of trumpets to you.

name: Numbers 29:2
text: You shall offer a burnt offering for a pleasant aroma to Yahweh: one young bull, one ram, seven male lambs a year old without blemish;

name: Numbers 29:3
text: and their meal offering, fine flour mixed with oil, three tenth parts for the bull, two tenth parts for the ram,

name: Numbers 29:4
text: and one tenth part for every lamb of the seven lambs;

name: Numbers 29:5
text: and one male goat for a sin offering, to make atonement for you;

name: Numbers 29:6
text: besides the burnt offering of the new moon, and the meal offering of it, and the continual burnt offering and the meal offering of it, and their drink offerings, according to their ordinance, for a pleasant aroma, an offering made by fire to Yahweh.

name: Numbers 29:7
text: ""On the tenth day of this seventh month you shall have a holy convocation; and you shall afflict your souls: you shall do no kind of work;

name: Numbers 29:8
text: but you shall offer a burnt offering to Yahweh for a pleasant aroma: one young bull, one ram, seven male lambs a year old; they shall be to you without blemish;

name: Numbers 29:9
text: and their meal offering, fine flour mixed with oil, three tenth parts for the bull, two tenth parts for the one ram,

name: Numbers 29:10
text: a tenth part for every lamb of the seven lambs:

name: Numbers 29:11
text: one male goat for a sin offering; besides the sin offering of atonement, and the continual burnt offering, and the meal offering of it, and their drink offerings.

name: Numbers 29:12
text: ""On the fifteenth day of the seventh month you shall have a holy convocation; you shall do no servile work, and you shall keep a feast to Yahweh seven days:

name: Numbers 29:13
text: and you shall offer a burnt offering, an offering made by fire, of a pleasant aroma to Yahweh; thirteen young bulls, two rams, fourteen male lambs a year old; they shall be without blemish;

name: Numbers 29:14
text: and their meal offering, fine flour mixed with oil, three tenth parts for every bull of the thirteen bulls, two tenth parts for each ram of the two rams,

name: Numbers 29:15
text: and a tenth part for every lamb of the fourteen lambs;

name: Numbers 29:16
text: and one male goat for a sin offering, besides the continual burnt offering, the meal offering of it, and the drink offering of it.

name: Numbers 29:17
text: ""On the second day you shall offer twelve young bulls, two rams, fourteen male lambs a year old without blemish;

name: Numbers 29:18
text: and their meal offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;

name: Numbers 29:19
text: and one male goat for a sin offering; besides the continual burnt offering, and the meal offering of it, and their drink offerings.

name: Numbers 29:20
text: ""On the third day eleven bulls, two rams, fourteen male lambs a year old without blemish;

name: Numbers 29:21
text: and their meal offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;

name: Numbers 29:22
text: and one male goat for a sin offering; besides the continual burnt offering, and the meal offering of it, and the drink offering of it.

name: Numbers 29:23
text: ""On the fourth day ten bulls, two rams, fourteen male lambs a year old without blemish;

name: Numbers 29:24
text: their meal offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;

name: Numbers 29:25
text: and one male goat for a sin offering; besides the continual burnt offering, the meal offering of it, and the drink offering of it.

name: Numbers 29:26
text: ""On the fifth day nine bulls, two rams, fourteen male lambs a year old without blemish;

name: Numbers 29:27
text: and their meal offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;

name: Numbers 29:28
text: and one male goat for a sin offering, besides the continual burnt offering, and the meal offering of it, and the drink offering of it.

name: Numbers 29:29
text: ""On the sixth day eight bulls, two rams, fourteen male lambs a year old without blemish;

name: Numbers 29:30
text: and their meal offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;

name: Numbers 29:31
text: and one male goat for a sin offering; besides the continual burnt offering, the meal offering of it, and the drink offerings of it.

name: Numbers 29:32
text: ""On the seventh day seven bulls, two rams, fourteen male lambs a year old without blemish;

name: Numbers 29:33
text: and their meal offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;

name: Numbers 29:34
text: and one male goat for a sin offering; besides the continual burnt offering, the meal offering of it, and the drink offering of it.

name: Numbers 29:35
text: ""On the eighth day you shall have a solemn assembly: you shall do no servile work;

name: Numbers 29:36
text: but you shall offer a burnt offering, an offering made by fire, of a pleasant aroma to Yahweh: one bull, one ram, seven male lambs a year old without blemish;

name: Numbers 29:37
text: their meal offering and their drink offerings for the bull, for the ram, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the ordinance:

name: Numbers 29:38
text: and one male goat for a sin offering, besides the continual burnt offering, and the meal offering of it, and the drink offering of it.

name: Numbers 29:39
text: ""You shall offer these to Yahweh in your set feasts, besides your vows, and your freewill offerings, for your burnt offerings, and for your meal offerings, and for your drink offerings, and for your peace offerings.""

name: Numbers 29:40
text: Moses told the children of Israel according to all that Yahweh commanded Moses.

name: Numbers 30:1
text: Moses spoke to the heads of the tribes of the children of Israel, saying, "This is the thing which Yahweh has commanded.

name: Numbers 30:2
text: When a man vows a vow to Yahweh, or swears an oath to bind his soul with a bond, he shall not break his word; he shall do according to all that proceeds out of his mouth.

name: Numbers 30:3
text: "Also when a woman vows a vow to Yahweh, and binds herself by a bond, being in her father"s house, in her youth,

name: Numbers 30:4
text: and her father hears her vow, and her bond with which she has bound her soul, and her father holds his peace at her; then all her vows shall stand, and every bond with which she has bound her soul shall stand.

name: Numbers 30:5
text: But if her father disallow her in the day that he hears, none of her vows, or of her bonds with which she has bound her soul, shall stand: and Yahweh will forgive her, because her father disallowed her.

name: Numbers 30:6
text: "If she has a husband, while her vows are on her, or the rash utterance of her lips, with which she has bound her soul,

name: Numbers 30:7
text: and her husband hears it, and hold his peace at her in the day that he hears it; then her vows shall stand, and her bonds with which she has bound her soul shall stand.

name: Numbers 30:8
text: But if her husband forbids her in the day that he hears it, then he shall make void her vow which is on her, and the rash utterance of her lips, with which she has bound her soul: and Yahweh will forgive her.

name: Numbers 30:9
text: "But the vow of a widow, or of her who is divorced, everything with which she has bound her soul, shall stand against her.

name: Numbers 30:10
text: "If she vowed in her husband"s house, or bound her soul by a bond with an oath,

name: Numbers 30:11
text: and her husband heard it, and held his peace at her, and didn"t disallow her; then all her vows shall stand, and every bond with which she bound her soul shall stand.

name: Numbers 30:12
text: But if her husband made them null and void in the day that he heard them, then whatever proceeded out of her lips concerning her vows, or concerning the bond of her soul, shall not stand: her husband has made them void; and Yahweh will forgive her.

name: Numbers 30:13
text: Every vow, and every binding oath to afflict the soul, her husband may establish it, or her husband may make it void.

name: Numbers 30:14
text: But if her husband altogether hold his peace at her from day to day, then he establishes all her vows, or all her bonds, which are on her: he has established them, because he held his peace at her in the day that he heard them.

name: Numbers 30:15
text: But if he shall make them null and void after that he has heard them, then he shall bear her iniquity."

name: Numbers 30:16
text: These are the statutes, which Yahweh commanded Moses, between a man and his wife, between a father and his daughter, being in her youth, in her father"s house.

name: Numbers 31:1
text: Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

name: Numbers 31:2
text: "Avenge the children of Israel for the Midianites. Afterward you shall be gathered to your people."

name: Numbers 31:3
text: Moses spoke to the people, saying, "Arm men from among you for the war, that they may go against Midian, to execute Yahweh"s vengeance on Midian.

name: Numbers 31:4
text: Of every tribe one thousand, throughout all the tribes of Israel, you shall send to the war."

name: Numbers 31:5
text: So there were delivered, out of the thousands of Israel, a thousand of every tribe, twelve thousand armed for war.

name: Numbers 31:6
text: Moses sent them, one thousand of every tribe, to the war, them and Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest, to the war, with the vessels of the sanctuary and the trumpets for the alarm in his hand.

name: Numbers 31:7
text: They warred against Midian, as Yahweh commanded Moses; and they killed every male.

name: Numbers 31:8
text: They killed the kings of Midian with the rest of their slain: Evi, and Rekem, and Zur, and Hur, and Reba, the five kings of Midian: Balaam also the son of Beor they killed with the sword.

name: Numbers 31:9
text: The children of Israel took captive the women of Midian and their little ones; and all their livestock, and all their flocks, and all their goods, they took for a prey.

name: Numbers 31:10
text: All their cities in the places in which they lived, and all their encampments, they burnt with fire.

name: Numbers 31:11
text: They took all the spoil, and all the prey, both of man and of animal.

name: Numbers 31:12
text: They brought the captives, and the prey, and the spoil, to Moses, and to Eleazar the priest, and to the congregation of the children of Israel, to the camp at the plains of Moab, which are by the Jordan at Jericho.

name: Numbers 31:13
text: Moses, and Eleazar the priest, and all the princes of the congregation, went forth to meet them outside of the camp.

name: Numbers 31:14
text: Moses was angry with the officers of the army, the captains of thousands and the captains of hundreds, who came from the service of the war.

name: Numbers 31:15
text: Moses said to them, "Have you saved all the women alive?

name: Numbers 31:16
text: Behold, these caused the children of Israel, through the counsel of Balaam, to commit trespass against Yahweh in the matter of Peor, and so the plague was among the congregation of Yahweh.

name: Numbers 31:17
text: Now therefore kill every male among the little ones, and kill every woman who has known man by lying with him.

name: Numbers 31:18
text: But all the girls, who have not known man by lying with him, keep alive for yourselves.

name: Numbers 31:19
text: "Encamp outside of the camp seven days: whoever has killed any person, and whoever has touched any slain, purify yourselves on the third day and on the seventh day, you and your captives.

name: Numbers 31:20
text: As to every garment, and all that is made of skin, and all work of goats" hair, and all things made of wood, you shall purify yourselves."

name: Numbers 31:21
text: Eleazar the priest said to the men of war who went to the battle, "This is the statute of the law which Yahweh has commanded Moses:

name: Numbers 31:22
text: however the gold, and the silver, the brass, the iron, the tin, and the lead,

name: Numbers 31:23
text: everything that may withstand the fire, you shall make to go through the fire, and it shall be clean; nevertheless it shall be purified with the water for impurity: and all that doesn"t withstand the fire you shall make to go through the water.

name: Numbers 31:24
text: You shall wash your clothes on the seventh day, and you shall be clean; and afterward you shall come into the camp."

name: Numbers 31:25
text: Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

name: Numbers 31:26
text: "Take the sum of the prey that was taken, both of man and of animal, you, and Eleazar the priest, and the heads of the fathers" households of the congregation;

name: Numbers 31:27
text: and divide the prey into two parts: between the men skilled in war, who went out to battle, and all the congregation.

name: Numbers 31:28
text: Levy a tribute to Yahweh of the men of war who went out to battle: one soul of five hundred; of the persons, of the cattle, of the donkeys, and of the flocks.

name: Numbers 31:29
text: Take it of their half, and give it to Eleazar the priest, for Yahweh"s wave offering.

name: Numbers 31:30
text: Of the children of Israel"s half, you shall take one drawn out of every fifty, of the persons, of the cattle, of the donkeys, and of the flocks, of all the livestock, and give them to the Levites, who perform the duty of the tabernacle of Yahweh."

name: Numbers 31:31
text: Moses and Eleazar the priest did as Yahweh commanded Moses.

name: Numbers 31:32
text: Now the prey, over and above the booty which the men of war took, was six hundred seventy-five thousand sheep,

name: Numbers 31:33
text: and seventy-two thousand head of cattle,

name: Numbers 31:34
text: and sixty-one thousand donkeys,

name: Numbers 31:35
text: and thirty-two thousand persons in all, of the women who had not known man by lying with him.

name: Numbers 31:36
text: The half, which was the portion of those who went out to war, was in number three hundred thirty-seven thousand five hundred sheep:

name: Numbers 31:37
text: and Yahweh"s tribute of the sheep was six hundred seventy-five.

name: Numbers 31:38
text: The cattle were thirty-six thousand; of which Yahweh"s tribute was seventy-two.

name: Numbers 31:39
text: The donkeys were thirty thousand five hundred; of which Yahweh"s tribute was sixty-one.

name: Numbers 31:40
text: The persons were sixteen thousand; of whom Yahweh"s tribute was thirty-two persons.

name: Numbers 31:41
text: Moses gave the tribute, which was Yahweh"s wave offering, to Eleazar the priest, as Yahweh commanded Moses.

name: Numbers 31:42
text: Of the children of Israel"s half, which Moses divided off from the men who warred

name: Numbers 31:43
text: (now the congregation"s half was three hundred thirty-seven thousand five hundred sheep,

name: Numbers 31:44
text: and thirty-six thousand head of cattle,

name: Numbers 31:45
text: and thirty thousand five hundred donkeys,

name: Numbers 31:46
text: and sixteen thousand persons),

name: Numbers 31:47
text: even of the children of Israel"s half, Moses took one drawn out of every fifty, both of man and of animal, and gave them to the Levites, who performed the duty of the tabernacle of Yahweh; as Yahweh commanded Moses.

name: Numbers 31:48
text: The officers who were over the thousands of the army, the captains of thousands, and the captains of hundreds, came near to Moses;

name: Numbers 31:49
text: and they said to Moses, "Your servants have taken the sum of the men of war who are under our command, and there lacks not one man of us.

name: Numbers 31:50
text: We have brought Yahweh"s offering, what every man has gotten, of jewels of gold, armlets, and bracelets, signet rings, earrings, and necklaces, to make atonement for our souls before Yahweh."

name: Numbers 31:51
text: Moses and Eleazar the priest took their gold, even all worked jewels.

name: Numbers 31:52
text: All the gold of the wave offering that they offered up to Yahweh, of the captains of thousands, and of the captains of hundreds, was sixteen thousand seven hundred fifty shekels.

name: Numbers 31:53
text: (The men of war had taken booty, every man for himself.)

name: Numbers 31:54
text: Moses and Eleazar the priest took the gold of the captains of thousands and of hundreds, and brought it into the Tent of Meeting, for a memorial for the children of Israel before Yahweh.

name: Numbers 32:1
text: Now the children of Reuben and the children of Gad had a very great multitude of livestock: and when they saw the land of Jazer, and the land of Gilead, that behold, the place was a place for livestock;

name: Numbers 32:2
text: the children of Gad and the children of Reuben came and spoke to Moses, and to Eleazar the priest, and to the princes of the congregation, saying,

name: Numbers 32:3
text: "Ataroth, and Dibon, and Jazer, and Nimrah, and Heshbon, and Elealeh, and Sebam, and Nebo, and Beon,

name: Numbers 32:4
text: the land which Yahweh struck before the congregation of Israel, is a land for livestock; and your servants have livestock."

name: Numbers 32:5
text: They said, "If we have found favor in your sight, let this land be given to your servants for a possession; don"t bring us over the Jordan."

name: Numbers 32:6
text: Moses said to the children of Gad, and to the children of Reuben, "Shall your brothers go to the war, and shall you sit here?

name: Numbers 32:7
text: Why do you discourage the heart of the children of Israel from going over into the land which Yahweh has given them?

name: Numbers 32:8
text: Your fathers did so when I sent them from Kadesh Barnea to see the land.

name: Numbers 32:9
text: For when they went up to the valley of Eshcol, and saw the land, they discouraged the heart of the children of Israel, that they should not go into the land which Yahweh had given them.

name: Numbers 32:10
text: Yahweh"s anger was kindled in that day, and he swore, saying,

name: Numbers 32:11
text: "Surely none of the men who came up out of Egypt, from twenty years old and upward, shall see the land which I swore to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob; because they have not wholly followed me:

name: Numbers 32:12
text: except Caleb the son of Jephunneh the Kenizzite, and Joshua the son of Nun; because they have followed Yahweh completely."

name: Numbers 32:13
text: Yahweh"s anger was kindled against Israel, and he made them wander back and forth in the wilderness forty years, until all the generation, who had done evil in the sight of Yahweh, was consumed.

name: Numbers 32:14
text: "Behold, you have risen up in your fathers" place, an increase of sinful men, to augment yet the fierce anger of Yahweh toward Israel.

name: Numbers 32:15
text: For if you turn away from after him, he will yet again leave them in the wilderness; and you will destroy all this people."

name: Numbers 32:16
text: They came near to him, and said, "We will build sheepfolds here for our livestock, and cities for our little ones:

name: Numbers 32:17
text: but we ourselves will be ready armed to go before the children of Israel, until we have brought them to their place: and our little ones shall dwell in the fortified cities because of the inhabitants of the land.

name: Numbers 32:18
text: We will not return to our houses, until the children of Israel have inherited every man his inheritance.

name: Numbers 32:19
text: For we will not inherit with them on the other side of the Jordan, and forward; because our inheritance is fallen to us on this side of the Jordan eastward."

name: Numbers 32:20
text: Moses said to them, "If you will do this thing, if you will arm yourselves to go before Yahweh to the war,

name: Numbers 32:21
text: and every armed man of you will pass over the Jordan before Yahweh, until he has driven out his enemies from before him,

name: Numbers 32:22
text: and the land is subdued before Yahweh; then afterward you shall return, and be guiltless towards Yahweh, and towards Israel; and this land shall be to you for a possession before Yahweh.

name: Numbers 32:23
text: "But if you will not do so, behold, you have sinned against Yahweh; and be sure your sin will find you out.

name: Numbers 32:24
text: Build cities for your little ones, and folds for your sheep; and do that which has proceeded out of your mouth."

name: Numbers 32:25
text: The children of Gad and the children of Reuben spoke to Moses, saying, "Your servants will do as my lord commands.

name: Numbers 32:26
text: Our little ones, our wives, our flocks, and all our livestock, shall be there in the cities of Gilead;

name: Numbers 32:27
text: but your servants will pass over, every man who is armed for war, before Yahweh to battle, as my lord says."

name: Numbers 32:28
text: So Moses commanded concerning them to Eleazar the priest, and to Joshua the son of Nun, and to the heads of the fathers" households of the tribes of the children of Israel.

name: Numbers 32:29
text: Moses said to them, "If the children of Gad and the children of Reuben will pass with you over the Jordan, every man who is armed to battle, before Yahweh, and the land shall be subdued before you; then you shall give them the land of Gilead for a possession:

name: Numbers 32:30
text: but if they will not pass over with you armed, they shall have possessions among you in the land of Canaan."

name: Numbers 32:31
text: The children of Gad and the children of Reuben answered, saying, "As Yahweh has said to your servants, so will we do.

name: Numbers 32:32
text: We will pass over armed before Yahweh into the land of Canaan, and the possession of our inheritance shall remain with us beyond the Jordan."

name: Numbers 32:33
text: Moses gave to them, even to the children of Gad, and to the children of Reuben, and to the half-tribe of Manasseh the son of Joseph, the kingdom of Sihon king of the Amorites, and the kingdom of Og king of Bashan, the land, according to its cities and borders, even the cities of the surrounding land.

name: Numbers 32:34
text: The children of Gad built Dibon, and Ataroth, and Aroer,

name: Numbers 32:35
text: and Atrothshophan, and Jazer, and Jogbehah,

name: Numbers 32:36
text: and Beth Nimrah, and Beth Haran: fortified cities, and folds for sheep.

name: Numbers 32:37
text: The children of Reuben built Heshbon, and Elealeh, and Kiriathaim,

name: Numbers 32:38
text: and Nebo, and Baal Meon, (their names being changed), and Sibmah: and they gave other names to the cities which they built.

name: Numbers 32:39
text: The children of Machir the son of Manasseh went to Gilead, and took it, and dispossessed the Amorites who were therein.

name: Numbers 32:40
text: Moses gave Gilead to Machir the son of Manasseh; and he lived therein.

name: Numbers 32:41
text: Jair the son of Manasseh went and took its towns, and called them Havvoth Jair.

name: Numbers 32:42
text: Nobah went and took Kenath, and its villages, and called it Nobah, after his own name.

name: Numbers 33:1
text: These are the journeys of the children of Israel, when they went forth out of the land of Egypt by their armies under the hand of Moses and Aaron.

name: Numbers 33:2
text: Moses wrote their goings out according to their journeys by the commandment of Yahweh: and these are their journeys according to their goings out.

name: Numbers 33:3
text: They traveled from Rameses in the first month, on the fifteenth day of the first month; on the next day after the Passover the children of Israel went out with a high hand in the sight of all the Egyptians,

name: Numbers 33:4
text: while the Egyptians were burying all their firstborn, whom Yahweh had struck among them: on their gods also Yahweh executed judgments.

name: Numbers 33:5
text: The children of Israel traveled from Rameses, and encamped in Succoth.

name: Numbers 33:6
text: They traveled from Succoth, and encamped in Etham, which is in the edge of the wilderness.

name: Numbers 33:7
text: They traveled from Etham, and turned back to Pihahiroth, which is before Baal Zephon: and they encamped before Migdol.

name: Numbers 33:8
text: They traveled from before Hahiroth, and passed through the midst of the sea into the wilderness: and they went three days" journey in the wilderness of Etham, and encamped in Marah.

name: Numbers 33:9
text: They traveled from Marah, and came to Elim: and in Elim were twelve springs of water, and seventy palm trees; and they encamped there.

name: Numbers 33:10
text: They traveled from Elim, and encamped by the Red Sea.

name: Numbers 33:11
text: They traveled from the Red Sea, and encamped in the wilderness of Sin.

name: Numbers 33:12
text: They traveled from the wilderness of Sin, and encamped in Dophkah.

name: Numbers 33:13
text: They traveled from Dophkah, and encamped in Alush.

name: Numbers 33:14
text: They traveled from Alush, and encamped in Rephidim, where there was no water for the people to drink.

name: Numbers 33:15
text: They traveled from Rephidim, and encamped in the wilderness of Sinai.

name: Numbers 33:16
text: They traveled from the wilderness of Sinai, and encamped in Kibroth Hattaavah.

name: Numbers 33:17
text: They traveled from Kibroth Hattaavah, and encamped in Hazeroth.

name: Numbers 33:18
text: They traveled from Hazeroth, and encamped in Rithmah.

name: Numbers 33:19
text: They traveled from Rithmah, and encamped in Rimmon Perez.

name: Numbers 33:20
text: They traveled from Rimmon Perez, and encamped in Libnah.

name: Numbers 33:21
text: They traveled from Libnah, and encamped in Rissah.

name: Numbers 33:22
text: They traveled from Rissah, and encamped in Kehelathah.

name: Numbers 33:23
text: They traveled from Kehelathah, and encamped in Mount Shepher.

name: Numbers 33:24
text: They traveled from Mount Shepher, and encamped in Haradah.

name: Numbers 33:25
text: They traveled from Haradah, and encamped in Makheloth.

name: Numbers 33:26
text: They traveled from Makheloth, and encamped in Tahath.

name: Numbers 33:27
text: They traveled from Tahath, and encamped in Terah.

name: Numbers 33:28
text: They traveled from Terah, and encamped in Mithkah.

name: Numbers 33:29
text: They traveled from Mithkah, and encamped in Hashmonah.

name: Numbers 33:30
text: They traveled from Hashmonah, and encamped in Moseroth.

name: Numbers 33:31
text: They traveled from Moseroth, and encamped in Bene Jaakan.

name: Numbers 33:32
text: They traveled from Bene Jaakan, and encamped in Hor Haggidgad.

name: Numbers 33:33
text: They traveled from Hor Haggidgad, and encamped in Jotbathah.

name: Numbers 33:34
text: They traveled from Jotbathah, and encamped in Abronah.

name: Numbers 33:35
text: They traveled from Abronah, and encamped in Ezion Geber.

name: Numbers 33:36
text: They traveled from Ezion Geber, and encamped in the wilderness of Zin (the same is Kadesh).

name: Numbers 33:37
text: They traveled from Kadesh, and encamped in Mount Hor, in the edge of the land of Edom.

name: Numbers 33:38
text: Aaron the priest went up into Mount Hor at the commandment of Yahweh, and died there, in the fortieth year after the children of Israel had come out of the land of Egypt, in the fifth month, on the first day of the month.

name: Numbers 33:39
text: Aaron was one hundred twenty-three years old when he died in Mount Hor.

name: Numbers 33:40
text: The Canaanite, the king of Arad, who lived in the South in the land of Canaan, heard of the coming of the children of Israel.

name: Numbers 33:41
text: They traveled from Mount Hor, and encamped in Zalmonah.

name: Numbers 33:42
text: They traveled from Zalmonah, and encamped in Punon.

name: Numbers 33:43
text: They traveled from Punon, and encamped in Oboth.

name: Numbers 33:44
text: They traveled from Oboth, and encamped in Iye Abarim, in the border of Moab.

name: Numbers 33:45
text: They traveled from Iyim, and encamped in Dibon Gad.

name: Numbers 33:46
text: They traveled from Dibon Gad, and encamped in Almon Diblathaim.

name: Numbers 33:47
text: They traveled from Almon Diblathaim, and encamped in the mountains of Abarim, before Nebo.

name: Numbers 33:48
text: They traveled from the mountains of Abarim, and encamped in the plains of Moab by the Jordan at Jericho.

name: Numbers 33:49
text: They encamped by the Jordan, from Beth Jeshimoth even to Abel Shittim in the plains of Moab.

name: Numbers 33:50
text: Yahweh spoke to Moses in the plains of Moab by the Jordan at Jericho, saying,

name: Numbers 33:51
text: Speak to the children of Israel, and tell them, "When you pass over the Jordan into the land of Canaan,

name: Numbers 33:52
text: then you shall drive out all the inhabitants of the land from before you, destroy all their stone idols, destroy all their molten images, and demolish all their high places.

name: Numbers 33:53
text: You shall take possession of the land, and dwell therein; for I have given given the land to you to possess it.

name: Numbers 33:54
text: You shall inherit the land by lot according to your families; to the more you shall give the more inheritance, and to the fewer you shall give the less inheritance: wherever the lot falls to any man, that shall be his. You shall inherit according to the tribes of your fathers.

name: Numbers 33:55
text: "But if you do not drive out the inhabitants of the land from before you, then those you let remain of them will be as pricks in your eyes and as thorns in your sides, and they will harass you in the land in which you dwell.

name: Numbers 33:56
text: It shall happen that as I thought to do to them, so will I do to you."

name: Numbers 34:1
text: Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

name: Numbers 34:2
text: "Command the children of Israel, and tell them, "When you come into the land of Canaan (this is the land that shall fall to you for an inheritance, even the land of Canaan according to its borders),

name: Numbers 34:3
text: then your south quarter shall be from the wilderness of Zin along by the side of Edom, and your south border shall be from the end of the Salt Sea eastward;

name: Numbers 34:4
text: and your border shall turn about southward of the ascent of Akrabbim, and pass along to Zin; and the goings out of it shall be southward of Kadesh Barnea; and it shall go forth to Hazar Addar, and pass along to Azmon;

name: Numbers 34:5
text: and the border shall turn about from Azmon to the brook of Egypt, and the goings out of it shall be at the sea.

name: Numbers 34:6
text: ""For the western border, you shall have the great sea and its border: this shall be your west border.

name: Numbers 34:7
text: ""This shall be your north border: from the great sea you shall mark out for you Mount Hor;

name: Numbers 34:8
text: from Mount Hor you shall mark out to the entrance of Hamath; and the goings out of the border shall be at Zedad;

name: Numbers 34:9
text: and the border shall go forth to Ziphron, and the goings out of it shall be at Hazar Enan: this shall be your north border.

name: Numbers 34:10
text: ""You shall mark out your east border from Hazar Enan to Shepham;

name: Numbers 34:11
text: and the border shall go down from Shepham to Riblah, on the east side of Ain; and the border shall go down, and shall reach to the side of the sea of Chinnereth eastward;

name: Numbers 34:12
text: and the border shall go down to the Jordan, and the goings out of it shall be at the Salt Sea. This shall be your land according to its borders around it.""

name: Numbers 34:13
text: Moses commanded the children of Israel, saying, "This is the land which you shall inherit by lot, which Yahweh has commanded to give to the nine tribes, and to the half-tribe;

name: Numbers 34:14
text: for the tribe of the children of Reuben according to their fathers" houses, and the tribe of the children of Gad according to their fathers" houses, have received, and the half-tribe of Manasseh have received, their inheritance:

name: Numbers 34:15
text: the two tribes and the half-tribe have received their inheritance beyond the Jordan at Jericho eastward, toward the sunrise."

name: Numbers 34:16
text: Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

name: Numbers 34:17
text: "These are the names of the men who shall divide the land to you for inheritance: Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun.

name: Numbers 34:18
text: You shall take one prince of every tribe, to divide the land for inheritance.

name: Numbers 34:19
text: These are the names of the men: Of the tribe of Judah, Caleb the son of Jephunneh.

name: Numbers 34:20
text: Of the tribe of the children of Simeon, Shemuel the son of Ammihud.

name: Numbers 34:21
text: Of the tribe of Benjamin, Elidad the son of Chislon.

name: Numbers 34:22
text: Of the tribe of the children of Dan a prince, Bukki the son of Jogli.

name: Numbers 34:23
text: Of the children of Joseph: of the tribe of the children of Manasseh a prince, Hanniel the son of Ephod.

name: Numbers 34:24
text: Of the tribe of the children of Ephraim a prince, Kemuel the son of Shiphtan.

name: Numbers 34:25
text: Of the tribe of the children of Zebulun a prince, Elizaphan the son of Parnach.

name: Numbers 34:26
text: Of the tribe of the children of Issachar a prince, Paltiel the son of Azzan.

name: Numbers 34:27
text: Of the tribe of the children of Asher a prince, Ahihud the son of Shelomi.

name: Numbers 34:28
text: Of the tribe of the children of Naphtali a prince, Pedahel the son of Ammihud."

name: Numbers 34:29
text: These are they whom Yahweh commanded to divide the inheritance to the children of Israel in the land of Canaan.

name: Numbers 35:1
text: Yahweh spoke to Moses in the plains of Moab by the Jordan at Jericho, saying,

name: Numbers 35:2
text: "Command the children of Israel that they give to the Levites of the inheritance of their possession cities to dwell in; and you shall give suburbs for the cities around them to the Levites.

name: Numbers 35:3
text: The cities shall they have to dwell in; and their suburbs shall be for their livestock, and for their substance, and for all their animals.

name: Numbers 35:4
text: "The suburbs of the cities, which you shall give to the Levites, shall be from the wall of the city and outward one thousand cubits around it.

name: Numbers 35:5
text: You shall measure outside of the city for the east side two thousand cubits, and for the south side two thousand cubits, and for the west side two thousand cubits, and for the north side two thousand cubits, the city being in the midst. This shall be to them the suburbs of the cities.

name: Numbers 35:6
text: "The cities which you shall give to the Levites, they shall be the six cities of refuge, which you shall give for the manslayer to flee to: and besides them you shall give forty-two cities.

name: Numbers 35:7
text: All the cities which you shall give to the Levites shall be forty-eight cities together with their suburbs.

name: Numbers 35:8
text: Concerning the cities which you shall give of the possession of the children of Israel, from the many you shall take many; and from the few you shall take few: everyone according to his inheritance which he inherits shall give of his cities to the Levites."

name: Numbers 35:9
text: Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

name: Numbers 35:10
text: "Speak to the children of Israel, and tell them, "When you pass over the Jordan into the land of Canaan,

name: Numbers 35:11
text: then you shall appoint you cities to be cities of refuge for you, that the manslayer who kills any person unwittingly may flee there.

name: Numbers 35:12
text: The cities shall be to you for refuge from the avenger, that the manslayer not die, until he stands before the congregation for judgment.

name: Numbers 35:13
text: The cities which you shall give shall be for you six cities of refuge.

name: Numbers 35:14
text: You shall give three cities beyond the Jordan, and you shall give three cities in the land of Canaan; they shall be cities of refuge.

name: Numbers 35:15
text: For the children of Israel, and for the stranger and for the foreigner living among them, shall these six cities be for refuge; that everyone who kills any person unwittingly may flee there.

name: Numbers 35:16
text: ""But if he struck him with an instrument of iron, so that he died, he is a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.

name: Numbers 35:17
text: If he struck him with a stone in the hand, by which a man may die, and he died, he is a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.

name: Numbers 35:18
text: Or if he struck him with a weapon of wood in the hand, by which a man may die, and he died, he is a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.

name: Numbers 35:19
text: The avenger of blood shall himself put the murderer to death: when he meets him, he shall put him to death.

name: Numbers 35:20
text: If he thrust him of hatred, or hurled at him, lying in wait, so that he died,

name: Numbers 35:21
text: or in enmity struck him with his hand, so that he died; he who struck him shall surely be put to death; he is a murderer: the avenger of blood shall put the murderer to death, when he meets him.

name: Numbers 35:22
text: ""But if he thrust him suddenly without enmity, or hurled on him anything without lying in wait,

name: Numbers 35:23
text: or with any stone, by which a man may die, not seeing him, and cast it on him, so that he died, and he was not his enemy, neither sought his harm;

name: Numbers 35:24
text: then the congregation shall judge between the striker and the avenger of blood according to these ordinances;

name: Numbers 35:25
text: and the congregation shall deliver the manslayer out of the hand of the avenger of blood, and the congregation shall restore him to his city of refuge, where he was fled: and he shall dwell therein until the death of the high priest, who was anointed with the holy oil.

name: Numbers 35:26
text: ""But if the manslayer shall at any time go beyond the border of his city of refuge, where he flees,

name: Numbers 35:27
text: and the avenger of blood find him outside of the border of his city of refuge, and the avenger of blood kill the manslayer; he shall not be guilty of blood,

name: Numbers 35:28
text: because he should have remained in his city of refuge until the death of the high priest: but after the death of the high priest the manslayer shall return into the land of his possession.

name: Numbers 35:29
text: ""These things shall be for a statute and ordinance to you throughout your generations in all your dwellings.

name: Numbers 35:30
text: ""Whoever kills any person, the murderer shall be slain at the mouth of witnesses: but one witness shall not testify against any person that he die.

name: Numbers 35:31
text: ""Moreover you shall take no ransom for the life of a murderer who is guilty of death; but he shall surely be put to death.

name: Numbers 35:32
text: ""You shall take no ransom for him who is fled to his city of refuge, that he may come again to dwell in the land, until the death of the priest.

name: Numbers 35:33
text: ""So you shall not pollute the land in which you are: for blood, it pollutes the land; and no expiation can be made for the land for the blood that is shed therein, but by the blood of him who shed it.

name: Numbers 35:34
text: You shall not defile the land which you inhabit, in the midst of which I dwell: for I, Yahweh, dwell in the midst of the children of Israel.""

name: Numbers 36:1
text: The heads of the fathers" households of the family of the children of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, of the families of the sons of Joseph, came near, and spoke before Moses, and before the princes, the heads of the fathers" households of the children of Israel:

name: Numbers 36:2
text: and they said, "Yahweh commanded my lord to give the land for inheritance by lot to the children of Israel: and my lord was commanded by Yahweh to give the inheritance of Zelophehad our brother to his daughters.

name: Numbers 36:3
text: If they are married to any of the sons of the other tribes of the children of Israel, then will their inheritance be taken away from the inheritance of our fathers, and will be added to the inheritance of the tribe whereunto they shall belong: so will it be taken away from the lot of our inheritance.

name: Numbers 36:4
text: When the jubilee of the children of Israel shall be, then will their inheritance be added to the inheritance of the tribe whereunto they shall belong: so will their inheritance be taken away from the inheritance of the tribe of our fathers."

name: Numbers 36:5
text: Moses commanded the children of Israel according to the word of Yahweh, saying, "The tribe of the sons of Joseph speaks right.

name: Numbers 36:6
text: This is the thing which Yahweh does command concerning the daughters of Zelophehad, saying, Let them be married to whom they think best; only into the family of the tribe of their father shall they be married.

name: Numbers 36:7
text: So shall no inheritance of the children of Israel remove from tribe to tribe; for the children of Israel shall all keep the inheritance of the tribe of his fathers.

name: Numbers 36:8
text: Every daughter who possesses an inheritance in any tribe of the children of Israel shall be wife to one of the family of the tribe of her father, that the children of Israel may possess every man the inheritance of his fathers.

name: Numbers 36:9
text: So shall no inheritance remove from one tribe to another tribe; for the tribes of the children of Israel shall each keep his own inheritance."

name: Numbers 36:10
text: The daughters of Zelophehad did as Yahweh commanded Moses:

name: Numbers 36:11
text: for Mahlah, Tirzah, and Hoglah, and Milcah, and Noah, the daughters of Zelophehad, were married to their father"s brothers" sons.

name: Numbers 36:12
text: They were married into the families of the sons of Manasseh the son of Joseph; and their inheritance remained in the tribe of the family of their father.

name: Numbers 36:13
text: These are the commandments and the ordinances which Yahweh commanded by Moses to the children of Israel in the plains of Moab by the Jordan at Jericho.

name: Deuteronomy 1:1
text: These are the words which Moses spoke to all Israel beyond the Jordan in the wilderness, in the Arabah over against Suph, between Paran, and Tophel, and Laban, and Hazeroth, and Dizahab.

name: Deuteronomy 1:2
text: It is eleven days" journey from Horeb by the way of Mount Seir to Kadesh Barnea.

name: Deuteronomy 1:3
text: It happened in the fortieth year, in the eleventh month, on the first day of the month, that Moses spoke to the children of Israel, according to all that Yahweh had given him in commandment to them;

name: Deuteronomy 1:4
text: after he had struck Sihon the king of the Amorites, who lived in Heshbon, and Og the king of Bashan, who lived in Ashtaroth, at Edrei.

name: Deuteronomy 1:5
text: Beyond the Jordan, in the land of Moab, began Moses to declare this law, saying,

name: Deuteronomy 1:6
text: "Yahweh our God spoke to us in Horeb, saying, You have lived long enough in this mountain:

name: Deuteronomy 1:7
text: turn, and take your journey, and go to the hill country of the Amorites, and to all the places near there, in the Arabah, in the hill country, and in the lowland, and in the South, and by the seashore, the land of the Canaanites, and Lebanon, as far as the great river, the river Euphrates.

name: Deuteronomy 1:8
text: Behold, I have set the land before you: go in and possess the land which Yahweh swore to your fathers, to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob, to give to them and to their seed after them."

name: Deuteronomy 1:9
text: I spoke to you at that time, saying, "I am not able to bear you myself alone:

name: Deuteronomy 1:10
text: Yahweh your God has multiplied you, and behold, you are this day as the stars of the sky for multitude.

name: Deuteronomy 1:11
text: Yahweh, the God of your fathers, make you a thousand times as many as you are, and bless you, as he has promised you!

name: Deuteronomy 1:12
text: How can I myself alone bear your encumbrance, and your burden, and your strife?

name: Deuteronomy 1:13
text: Take wise men of understanding and well known according to your tribes, and I will make them heads over you."

name: Deuteronomy 1:14
text: You answered me, and said, "The thing which you have spoken is good to do."

name: Deuteronomy 1:15
text: So I took the heads of your tribes, wise men, and known, and made them heads over you, captains of thousands, and captains of hundreds, and captains of fifties, and captains of tens, and officers, according to your tribes.

name: Deuteronomy 1:16
text: I commanded your judges at that time, saying, "Hear cases between your brothers, and judge righteously between a man and his brother, and the foreigner who is living with him.

name: Deuteronomy 1:17
text: You shall not show partiality in judgment; you shall hear the small and the great alike; you shall not be afraid of the face of man; for the judgment is God"s. The case that is too hard for you, you shall bring to me, and I will hear it."

name: Deuteronomy 1:18
text: I commanded you at that time all the things which you should do.

name: Deuteronomy 1:19
text: We traveled from Horeb, and went through all that great and terrible wilderness which you saw, by the way to the hill country of the Amorites, as Yahweh our God commanded us; and we came to Kadesh Barnea.

name: Deuteronomy 1:20
text: I said to you, "You have come to the hill country of the Amorites, which Yahweh our God gives to us.

name: Deuteronomy 1:21
text: Behold, Yahweh your God has set the land before you: go up, take possession, as Yahweh, the God of your fathers, has spoken to you; don"t be afraid, neither be dismayed."

name: Deuteronomy 1:22
text: You came near to me everyone of you, and said, "Let us send men before us, that they may search the land for us, and bring us word again of the way by which we must go up, and the cities to which we shall come."

name: Deuteronomy 1:23
text: The thing pleased me well; and I took twelve men of you, one man for every tribe:

name: Deuteronomy 1:24
text: and they turned and went up into the hill country, and came to the valley of Eshcol, and spied it out.

name: Deuteronomy 1:25
text: They took of the fruit of the land in their hands, and brought it down to us, and brought us word again, and said, "It is a good land which Yahweh our God gives to us."

name: Deuteronomy 1:26
text: Yet you wouldn"t go up, but rebelled against the commandment of Yahweh your God:

name: Deuteronomy 1:27
text: and you murmured in your tents, and said, "Because Yahweh hated us, he has brought us forth out of the land of Egypt, to deliver us into the hand of the Amorites, to destroy us.

name: Deuteronomy 1:28
text: Where are we going up? our brothers have made our heart to melt, saying, "The people are greater and taller than we; the cities are great and fortified up to the sky; and moreover we have seen the sons of the Anakim there.""

name: Deuteronomy 1:29
text: Then I said to you, "Don"t dread, neither be afraid of them.

name: Deuteronomy 1:30
text: Yahweh your God who goes before you, he will fight for you, according to all that he did for you in Egypt before your eyes,

name: Deuteronomy 1:31
text: and in the wilderness, where you have seen how that Yahweh your God bore you, as a man does bear his son, in all the way that you went, until you came to this place."

name: Deuteronomy 1:32
text: Yet in this thing you didn"t believe Yahweh your God,

name: Deuteronomy 1:33
text: who went before you in the way, to seek you out a place to pitch your tents in, in fire by night, to show you by what way you should go, and in the cloud by day.

name: Deuteronomy 1:34
text: Yahweh heard the voice of your words, and was angry, and swore, saying,

name: Deuteronomy 1:35
text: "Surely not one of these men of this evil generation shall see the good land, which I swore to give to your fathers,

name: Deuteronomy 1:36
text: except Caleb the son of Jephunneh: he shall see it; and to him will I give the land that he has trodden on, and to his children, because he has wholly followed Yahweh."

name: Deuteronomy 1:37
text: Also Yahweh was angry with me for your sakes, saying, "You also shall not go in there:

name: Deuteronomy 1:38
text: Joshua the son of Nun, who stands before you, he shall go in there: encourage you him; for he shall cause Israel to inherit it.

name: Deuteronomy 1:39
text: Moreover your little ones, whom you said should be a prey, and your children, who this day have no knowledge of good or evil, they shall go in there, and to them will I give it, and they shall possess it.

name: Deuteronomy 1:40
text: But as for you, turn, and take your journey into the wilderness by the way to the Red Sea."

name: Deuteronomy 1:41
text: Then you answered and said to me, "We have sinned against Yahweh, we will go up and fight, according to all that Yahweh our God commanded us." Every man of you put on his weapons of war, and presumed to go up into the hill country.

name: Deuteronomy 1:42
text: Yahweh said to me, "Tell them, "Don"t go up, neither fight; for I am not among you; lest you be struck before your enemies.""

name: Deuteronomy 1:43
text: So I spoke to you, and you didn"t listen; but you rebelled against the commandment of Yahweh, and were presumptuous, and went up into the hill country.

name: Deuteronomy 1:44
text: The Amorites, who lived in that hill country, came out against you, and chased you, as bees do, and beat you down in Seir, even to Hormah.

name: Deuteronomy 1:45
text: You returned and wept before Yahweh; but Yahweh didn"t listen to your voice, nor gave ear to you.

name: Deuteronomy 1:46
text: So you stayed in Kadesh many days, according to the days that you remained.

name: Deuteronomy 2:1
text: Then we turned, and took our journey into the wilderness by the way to the Red Sea, as Yahweh spoke to me; and we encircled Mount Seir many days.

name: Deuteronomy 2:2
text: Yahweh spoke to me, saying,

name: Deuteronomy 2:3
text: "You have encircled this mountain long enough. Turn northward.

name: Deuteronomy 2:4
text: Command the people, saying, "You are to pass through the border of your brothers the children of Esau, who dwell in Seir; and they will be afraid of you: take good heed to yourselves therefore;

name: Deuteronomy 2:5
text: don"t contend with them; for I will not give you of their land, no, not so much as for the sole of the foot to tread on; because I have given Mount Seir to Esau for a possession.

name: Deuteronomy 2:6
text: You shall purchase food of them for money, that you may eat; and you shall also buy water of them for money, that you may drink.""

name: Deuteronomy 2:7
text: For Yahweh your God has blessed you in all the work of your hand; he has known your walking through this great wilderness: these forty years Yahweh your God has been with you; you have lacked nothing.

name: Deuteronomy 2:8
text: So we passed by from our brothers the children of Esau, who dwell in Seir, from the way of the Arabah from Elath and from Ezion Geber. We turned and passed by the way of the wilderness of Moab.

name: Deuteronomy 2:9
text: Yahweh said to me, "Don"t bother Moab, neither contend with them in battle; for I will not give you of his land for a possession; because I have given Ar to the children of Lot for a possession."

name: Deuteronomy 2:10
text: (The Emim lived therein before, a people great, and many, and tall, as the Anakim:

name: Deuteronomy 2:11
text: these also are accounted Rephaim, as the Anakim; but the Moabites call them Emim.

name: Deuteronomy 2:12
text: The Horites also lived in Seir before, but the children of Esau succeeded them; and they destroyed them from before them, and lived in their place; as Israel did to the land of his possession, which Yahweh gave to them.)

name: Deuteronomy 2:13
text: "Now rise up, and cross over the brook Zered." We went over the brook Zered.

name: Deuteronomy 2:14
text: The days in which we came from Kadesh Barnea, until we had come over the brook Zered, were thirty-eight years; until all the generation of the men of war were consumed from the midst of the camp, as Yahweh swore to them.

name: Deuteronomy 2:15
text: Moreover the hand of Yahweh was against them, to destroy them from the midst of the camp, until they were consumed.

name: Deuteronomy 2:16
text: So it happened, when all the men of war were consumed and dead from among the people,

name: Deuteronomy 2:17
text: that Yahweh spoke to me, saying,

name: Deuteronomy 2:18
text: "You are this day to pass over Ar, the border of Moab:

name: Deuteronomy 2:19
text: and when you come near over against the children of Ammon, don"t bother them, nor contend with them; for I will not give you of the land of the children of Ammon for a possession; because I have given it to the children of Lot for a possession."

name: Deuteronomy 2:20
text: (That also is accounted a land of Rephaim: Rephaim lived therein before; but the Ammonites call them Zamzummim,

name: Deuteronomy 2:21
text: a people great, and many, and tall, as the Anakim; but Yahweh destroyed them before them; and they succeeded them, and lived in their place;

name: Deuteronomy 2:22
text: as he did for the children of Esau, who dwell in Seir, when he destroyed the Horites from before them; and they succeeded them, and lived in their place even to this day:

name: Deuteronomy 2:23
text: and the Avvim, who lived in villages as far as Gaza, the Caphtorim, who came forth out of Caphtor, destroyed them, and lived in their place.)

name: Deuteronomy 2:24
text: "Rise up, take your journey, and pass over the valley of the Arnon: behold, I have given into your hand Sihon the Amorite, king of Heshbon, and his land; begin to possess it, and contend with him in battle.

name: Deuteronomy 2:25
text: This day will I begin to put the dread of you and the fear of you on the peoples who are under the whole sky, who shall hear the report of you, and shall tremble, and be in anguish because of you."

name: Deuteronomy 2:26
text: I sent messengers out of the wilderness of Kedemoth to Sihon king of Heshbon with words of peace, saying,

name: Deuteronomy 2:27
text: "Let me pass through your land: I will go along by the highway, I will turn neither to the right hand nor to the left.

name: Deuteronomy 2:28
text: You shall sell me food for money, that I may eat; and give me water for money, that I may drink: only let me pass through on my feet,

name: Deuteronomy 2:29
text: as the children of Esau who dwell in Seir, and the Moabites who dwell in Ar, did to me; until I shall pass over the Jordan into the land which Yahweh our God gives us."

name: Deuteronomy 2:30
text: But Sihon king of Heshbon would not let us pass by him; for Yahweh your God hardened his spirit, and made his heart obstinate, that he might deliver him into your hand, as at this day.

name: Deuteronomy 2:31
text: Yahweh said to me, "Behold, I have begun to deliver up Sihon and his land before you: begin to possess, that you may inherit his land."

name: Deuteronomy 2:32
text: Then Sihon came out against us, he and all his people, to battle at Jahaz.

name: Deuteronomy 2:33
text: Yahweh our God delivered him up before us; and we struck him, and his sons, and all his people.

name: Deuteronomy 2:34
text: We took all his cities at that time, and utterly destroyed every inhabited city, with the women and the little ones; we left none remaining:

name: Deuteronomy 2:35
text: only the livestock we took for a prey to ourselves, with the spoil of the cities which we had taken.

name: Deuteronomy 2:36
text: From Aroer, which is on the edge of the valley of the Arnon, and the city that is in the valley, even to Gilead, there was not a city too high for us; Yahweh our God delivered up all before us:

name: Deuteronomy 2:37
text: only to the land of the children of Ammon you didn"t come near; all the side of the river Jabbok, and the cities of the hill country, and wherever Yahweh our God forbade us.

name: Deuteronomy 3:1
text: Then we turned, and went up the way to Bashan: and Og the king of Bashan came out against us, he and all his people, to battle at Edrei.

name: Deuteronomy 3:2
text: Yahweh said to me, "Don"t fear him; for I have delivered him, and all his people, and his land, into your hand; and you shall do to him as you did to Sihon king of the Amorites, who lived at Heshbon."

name: Deuteronomy 3:3
text: So Yahweh our God delivered into our hand Og also, the king of Bashan, and all his people: and we struck him until none was left to him remaining.

name: Deuteronomy 3:4
text: We took all his cities at that time; there was not a city which we didn"t take from them; sixty cities, all the region of Argob, the kingdom of Og in Bashan.

name: Deuteronomy 3:5
text: All these were cities fortified with high walls, gates, and bars; besides the unwalled towns a great many.

name: Deuteronomy 3:6
text: We utterly destroyed them, as we did to Sihon king of Heshbon, utterly destroying every inhabited city, with the women and the little ones.

name: Deuteronomy 3:7
text: But all the livestock, and the spoil of the cities, we took for a prey to ourselves.

name: Deuteronomy 3:8
text: We took the land at that time out of the hand of the two kings of the Amorites who were beyond the Jordan, from the valley of the Arnon to Mount Hermon.

name: Deuteronomy 3:9
text: (The Sidonians call Hermon Sirion, and the Amorites call it Senir.)

name: Deuteronomy 3:10
text: We took all the cities of the plain, and all Gilead, and all Bashan, to Salecah and Edrei, cities of the kingdom of Og in Bashan.

name: Deuteronomy 3:11
text: (For only Og king of Bashan remained of the remnant of the Rephaim; behold, his bedstead was a bedstead of iron; isn"t it in Rabbah of the children of Ammon? nine cubits was its length, and four cubits its breadth, after the cubit of a man.)

name: Deuteronomy 3:12
text: This land we took in possession at that time: from Aroer, which is by the valley of the Arnon, and half the hill country of Gilead, and its cities, gave I to the Reubenites and to the Gadites:

name: Deuteronomy 3:13
text: and the rest of Gilead, and all Bashan, the kingdom of Og, gave I to the half-tribe of Manasseh; all the region of Argob, even all Bashan. (The same is called the land of Rephaim.

name: Deuteronomy 3:14
text: Jair the son of Manasseh took all the region of Argob, to the border of the Geshurites and the Maacathites, and called them, even Bashan, after his own name, Havvoth Jair, to this day.)

name: Deuteronomy 3:15
text: I gave Gilead to Machir.

name: Deuteronomy 3:16
text: To the Reubenites and to the Gadites I gave from Gilead even to the valley of the Arnon, the middle of the valley, and its border, even to the river Jabbok, which is the border of the children of Ammon;

name: Deuteronomy 3:17
text: the Arabah also, and the Jordan and its border, from Chinnereth even to the sea of the Arabah, the Salt Sea, under the slopes of Pisgah eastward.

name: Deuteronomy 3:18
text: I commanded you at that time, saying, "Yahweh your God has given you this land to possess it: you shall pass over armed before your brothers the children of Israel, all the men of valor.

name: Deuteronomy 3:19
text: But your wives, and your little ones, and your livestock, (I know that you have much livestock), shall live in your cities which I have given you,

name: Deuteronomy 3:20
text: until Yahweh gives rest to your brothers, as to you, and they also possess the land which Yahweh your God gives them beyond the Jordan: then you shall return every man to his possession, which I have given you."

name: Deuteronomy 3:21
text: I commanded Joshua at that time, saying, "Your eyes have seen all that Yahweh your God has done to these two kings: so shall Yahweh do to all the kingdoms where you go over.

name: Deuteronomy 3:22
text: You shall not fear them; for Yahweh your God, he it is who fights for you."

name: Deuteronomy 3:23
text: I begged Yahweh at that time, saying,

name: Deuteronomy 3:24
text: "Lord Yahweh, you have begun to show your servant your greatness, and your strong hand: for what god is there in heaven or in earth, that can do according to your works, and according to your mighty acts?

name: Deuteronomy 3:25
text: Please let me go over and see the good land that is beyond the Jordan, that goodly mountain, and Lebanon."

name: Deuteronomy 3:26
text: But Yahweh was angry with me for your sakes, and didn"t listen to me; and Yahweh said to me, "Let it suffice you; speak no more to me of this matter.

name: Deuteronomy 3:27
text: Go up to the top of Pisgah, and lift up your eyes westward, and northward, and southward, and eastward, and see with your eyes: for you shall not go over this Jordan.

name: Deuteronomy 3:28
text: But commission Joshua, and encourage him, and strengthen him; for he shall go over before this people, and he shall cause them to inherit the land which you shall see."
